hotkey.description: The keys to use as the keyboard shortcut that will move focus to the toast viewport.

label.description: An author-localized label for the toast viewport to provide context for screen reader users when navigating page landmarks. The available `{hotkey}` placeholder will be replaced for you. Alternatively, you can pass in a custom function to generate the label.

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.details: Read our [Composition](https://www.radix-vue.com/guides/composition.html) guide for more details.

as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.
